alert.note: Alert for Knott; Letcher; Perry; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 7:29PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Letcher, southeastern Perry, southern Knott and southwestern Pike Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 729 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cornettsville, or 10 miles southeast of Hazard, moving east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Letcher, David, Indian Bottom, Carbon Glow, Jeremiah, Roxana, Hot Spot, Premium, Redfox and Cody around 735 PM EDT. Whitesburg, Bath, Tillie, Isom, Van, Sackett, Crown, Amelia, Trailer and Marlowe around 740 PM EDT. Lucastown, Southdown, Farraday, Lester, Craftsville, Polly, Winters, Millstone, Sergent and Democrat around 745 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fleming-Neon, Lowndes, Cromona, Hemphill, Haymond, Chip, Baker, Tolliver Town, Neon Junction, Horn, Jenkins, Burdine, Beefhide, Gaskill, Adamson, Dunham, Myra, Dorton and Jonancy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
